pages.text: A strange white key, originally meant to open a blocked door.$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Can be switched to a gun with shift right-clicking.
Combine a house key and an iron door in a totem lathe.
A real gun! Reload by right-clicking bullets on it.$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Can be switched back to an office key with shift right-clicking.
